Description.name: Description0
Description.content:
Content manager is a role in OpenCms. Persons that are content managers can log in to OpenCms, but have very limited rights. Usually, they are only allowed to add, edit or remove content from a web page. They work only in the page editor.

In some cases content managers may also be allowed to add new pages or restructure a website. Then they may also work with the sitemap editor.
